Edit Record URI ViewHelper.description: Generates a URI for editing a specific record. The URI includes parameters for the record UID, target table, and optional fields to edit. You can also specify a return URL to redirect after editing.

Create New Record URI ViewHelper.description: Generates a URI for creating a new record. The URI includes parameters for the target table, page ID (pid), and optional UID for sorting. You can also set default values for fields and specify a return URL to redirect after creating the record.
